pr_title: HDDS-3222. Add integration test for Recon FSCK.

timeline.message: HDDS-3222. Add integration test for Recon FSCK.
Move test to different classes for smaller mini ozone cluster.

timeline.bodyText: We should have some timeout value, it's ok to increase it if needed.
timeline.author: swagle

replies.bodyText: Timeout is implicitly enforced through LambdaTestUtils.
replies.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.bodyText: Minor nit: should declare refs as final.
timeline.author: swagle

timeline.bodyText: If the task is persistent, restarting the task thread while keeping Recon running (which I don't know if is a possible scenario currently) will always check the DB.  If so, registered flag is unnecessary if DB check is cheap, otherwise it should be set outside of if.
timeline.author: adoroszlai

replies.bodyText: Good catch... I will fix it by removing the flag since the DB check is not expected to be costly.
replies.author: avijayanhwx

timeline.bodyText:
How about something like "The time interval of periodic sync of pipeline state from SCM to Recon"?  I think that's more friendly.
Also, as config type is time, values can be specified with units for clarity, eg. 10m (= 600s), so text doesn't need to state it's "in seconds".
